title: Literacy Enhancement Projects Utilizing Adolescent Literature

context.prior_knowledge: Basic reading/writing proficiency and interest in adolescent literature
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment utilizing libraries and smartphones, emphasizing student-centered participatory activities

learning_goals: Enhancing critical reading skills by analyzing at least three texts per week using adolescent literature books.
Improving expressive skills and logical thinking through weekly discussions and writing activities (20% improvement in pre-post assessment comparisons).
Reporting a 15% or higher increase in learning motivation and positive growth experiences through self-efficacy scale measurements.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
